import React from 'react' import './Hero.css' import hardware from './images/hardware2.png' import robotics from './images/robotics2.png' import software from './images/software.png' const Hero = () => { return (

2023 ECE

Summer Workshops

free ECE workshops for 1st years & 2nd years

Past Workshops

In 2023 summer, we have had three workshops as of July 06. These workshops are targeting 1st year & 2nd year ECE students and review the material covered in some of the ECE courses.
To book the future workshops, scroll down to the "Schedule" page and fill out the form.

2023 Summer

Software Workshop

We covered APS105, APS244, and ECE297.

Learn More

Hardware Workshop

We covered ECE110, ECE221, and ECE231.

) } export default Hero
